title: All I Want is Your Company - Novel Updates
tags: Character Growth   Female Protagonist   First Love   Heartwarming   Slow Romance
author: Shi Ba An   十八安
description: Song Linan met Jiang Yihe several years ago. On that fateful day, she was distraught after discovering that her parents were divorcing. Jiang Yihe's presence gave her great comfort. But they lost touch after that. Many years later, they meet again and recognize each other. People destined to meet will do so, by chance, and at precisely the right moment.>
